<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"downloadFile"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/environment/{environment}/files/{name}/download"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a signed url to download a [File](https://docs.ganymede.bio/app/files/FileBrowser) in an Environment by its name, which is its [URI](https://docs.ganymede.bio/sdk/FileTags#get_file_url).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"environment","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"name","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Signed Url","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
